titleStmt.title: World Wide Diplomatic Archives Index: Marshall Islands
Marshall Islands

div.head: Legislation
div.p: At the National Archives, public records 25 years old or more are open to the public except where specifically restricted for reason of national security or where the information is considered to be of sensitive nature.

div.head: Location
div.p: Alele Museum, Library and National Archives, Post Office Box 629, Majuro, Republic of the Marshall Islands 96960

div.head: Procedures
div.p: Researchers should contact the National Archives to inquire about specific holdings.
